page.title: 17THE THINGS WE DO
page.content: My name is Ben and I live at Yew Tree Farm.On our farm we have cows and pigs. I help my dad clean out the sheds because the pigs make a mess.We have four dogs,Kit,Twist,Bess and Ugly.I look for eggs on my farm.I have three hobbies,snooker,football and swimming. My name is Anna and I live in Wheaton Aston.I play the violin and I am getting on quite well.I am in the Brownies too,I like it alot.Jean and David bring their ambulance to Brownies and show us how to do First Aid. My name is Simon.I like collecting models.I have 2 planes and a helicopter on my bedroom ceiling.I also collect stamps.I have lots of posters in my room.I go to cubs-it is great! My name is James,I like to ride my bike.There is a pond near my house,we catch tadpoles in it.I like school,my favourite lessons are maths and craft.
